summary:
Hello,
This mod add 5 races of SlaughterFish....don\'t swim.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]AePsFGFueTY[/youtube]





This mod is a WIP.

Slaughterfish now live up to their name. They are big.....they are dangerous

If you try it and like it, please endorse! Constructive feedback is also welcome.


This Mod add 5 race of slaughterfish in the game.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AePsFGFueTY&feature=youtu.be

Now every differant slaughterfish have unique stats.
 Damage and hit points are unique to each type!
 Needless to say, in their last three sizes that are real killers!
 But this is not fatal ....
  there is not much chance that the measure will make the first contact, and I tried, you can easily reach has run away because they rarely bite when it is moving
 I have not invaded Tamriel, I put in some locations, the original slaughterfish have not changed and is still the same place.

UPDATE

 now in version 1.1:

 -change the meshes of 2 large slaughterfish
 News textures Hd

NEW UPDATE: 2.0
-exchange for some scale to the correct size has the depth of water, removed the two Riverwood, new size and stat for a slaughterfish between vanilla and average.




Installation
Extract the archive in the Skyrim directory and active Slaughterfish Monster.esp.


NOTES

More they are big.....more they are dangerous.
Sorry for my french English.
Endorse if you like.

Known Issues
No bugs detected when I tested in the CK. All textures and meshes are unique and should be compatible with any mods.

Thanks
Thanks to The Nexus
Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to you for checking out my mod!
author: Zbenji
